title: Chicken briyani
description: Chicken Biryani is a flavorful Indian rice dish made by layering marinated chicken with basmati rice and aromatic spices.

title: Veg briyani
description: Veg Biryani is a fragrant Indian rice dish made with basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and aromatic spices.

title: Egg Masala
description: Egg Masala is a spicy and flavorful Indian dish made with boiled eggs simmered in a rich, fragrant gravy of tomatoes, onions, and spices.

title: Fish_curry
description: Fish Curry is a tangy and spicy Indian dish made with fresh fish with spicy masala

title: Fish_Fry
description: Fish Fry is a savory dish where fish fillets are seasoned with spices, coated in flour or breadcrumbs, and shallow-fried until crispy and golden.

title: Chicken Tandoori
description: Chicken Tandoori is a popular Indian dish where marinated chicken is cooked in a tandoor (clay oven) or grill.

title: Chicken Handi
description: Chicken Handi is a rich and flavorful Indian curry made with chicken simmered in a blend of spices, tomatoes, onions, and yogurt.

title: Chicken Masala
description: Chicken masala is a rich and flavorful Indian curry made with chicken simmered in a blend of spices, tomatoes, onions, and yogurt.

title: Mushroom Masala
description: Mushroom Masala is a flavorful Indian dish featuring mushrooms cooked in a spicy, aromatic gravy made with tomatoes, onions, and a blend of spices..

title: Mix Veg
description: It's a nutritious and colorful curry often enjoyed with rice, roti, or naan.

title: Dal Fry
description: Dal Fry is a hearty Indian dish made with lentils cooked in a spiced commonly served with rice, roti, or naan.

title: Chole Masala
description: Chole Masala is a robust Indian dish made with chickpeas simmered in a rich, spiced tomato gravy.

title: Panner Masala
description: Paneer Masala is a popular North Indian dish, widely loved for its flavorful and creamy texture, enjoyed in homes and restaurants across India and beyond.

title: Dry Manchurian
description: Dry Manchurian is a popular Indo-Chinese dish featuring crispy, deep-fried vegetable or chicken balls  often served as a starter or appetizer.

title: Momos
description: Momos are dumplings originating from Tibet, filled with a mixture of meat or vegetables and spices.

title: Broasted Chicken
description: Broasted Chicken is a method of cooking where chicken is marinated, breaded, and then pressure-fried.

title: Papad Masala
description: Papad Masala is a flavorful Indian snack made from crispy papadums used as starter

title: Samsoa
description: Samosa is a popular Indian snack consisting of a crispy, triangular pastry filled with a spiced mixture of potatoes, peas, and sometimes meat.

title: Pizza
description: Pizza is a globally loved Italian dish featuring a baked flatbread topped with tomato sauce, cheese, and a variety of toppings.

title: Burger
description: Burger is a classic sandwich made with a patty, usually of beef or chicken, placed inside a bun and topped with ingredients like lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, and sauces.

title: Rasogulla
description: Rasogula is one of finest and best sweets

title: Gulab_jamun
description: Gulab Jamun is a sweet, soft dessert made of fried dough balls soaked in sugary syrup.

title: GajarHalwa
description: Gajar Halwa is a traditional Indian dessert made from grated carrots, simmered with milk, sugar, and ghee, flavored with cardamom, and garnished with nuts.

title: Jalebi
description: Jalebi is a popular Indian sweet made by deep-frying a flour batter into spiral shapes, then soaking them in a sugary syrup.

title: icecream
description: It comes in a variety of flavors and is often enjoyed as a treat on its own or paired with other desserts.

title: Pastery
description: It is commonly decorated with frosting and enjoyed for celebrations.
